document.full_text: tsuyako ito's mother carried her in her first tsunami in 1933, but in march, it was an admirer who took the last geisha of kamaishi, japan, to higher ground.
document.title: at age 84, a city's last geisha defies time and a 4th tsunami
lines_and_colors: tsuyako ito's mother carried her in her first tsunami in 1933, but in march, it was an admirer who took the last geisha of kamaishi, japan, to higher ground.
